ACTIVATION_HTML.TITLE: New user activation
ACTIVATION_HTML.NAME_USER: User with name: {{username}} created. Press the button to activate it.

ACTIVATION_TS.USER_NOT_FOUND: User {{username}} was not found at the system. Contact the administrator if you have registered this user or create a new one.
ACTIVATION_TS.TOKEN_NOT_FOUND: No token found in the system for the user {{username}}. An email has been resent to {{email} with a new token.
ACTIVATION_TS.EMAIL_NOT_SENT: It has not been possible to send an email to {{email}}. Try to refresh the page. If it happens again, contact the administrator.
ACTIVATION_TS.TOKEN_NOT_UPDATED: The token could not be updated. Try to refresh the page. If it happens again, contact the administrator.
ACTIVATION_TS.USER_NOT_ACTIVATED: User could not be activated. Try to refresh the page. If it happens again, contact the administrator.
ACTIVATION_TS.TOKEN_EXPIRED:
The token is not correct or it has expired (it has a validity of {{tokenTime}} s).
If you want to generate a new one, click on the link to have an email sent to you.
ACTIVATION_TS.NEW_TOKEN: New token created. Check your mail.

LOGIN_TS.USER_NOT_ACCEPTED_PRIVACY_CONDITIONS: The user has not accepted the privacy conditions
LOGIN_TS.USERNAME_REQUIRED: You have to enter the user name
LOGIN_TS.USERNAME_REQUIRED_PLEASE: You have to enter the user name
LOGIN_TS.EMAIL_SEND: An email has been sent to {{email}}. Follow your instructions.
LOGIN_TS.EMAIL_SEND_ERROR: Error when sending the email to {{email}}. Please try again.
LOGIN_TS.TOKEN_UPDATE_ERROR: Internal error when updating the token. Please try again.

MODIFY_PASSWORD_HTML.TITLE: AU Cultura
MODIFY_PASSWORD_HTML.PASSWORD_REQUIRED_ERROR: The password must meet the following criteria: minimum of 8 characters, maximum of 20 characters. It must include uppercase, lowercase, numbers and no spaces.

MODIFY_PASSWORD_TS.PASSWORD_REQUIRED_ERROR: The password must meet the following criteria: minimum of 8 characters, maximum of 20 characters. It has to include uppercase, lowercase, numbers and no spaces.
MODIFY_PASSWORD_TS.USER_NOT_FOUND: User {{username}} has not been found at the system. Please contact the administrator if you have registered this user or create a new one.
MODIFY_PASSWORD_TS.TOKEN_GENERATED: Token generated. An email has been forwarded to {{email}} with a new token.
MODIFY_PASSWORD_TS.EMAIL_NOT_SENT: An email could not be sent to {{email}}. Try to refresh the page. If it happens again, contact the administrator.
MODIFY_PASSWORD_TS.TOKEN_NOT_UPDATED: The token could not be updated. Try to refresh the page. If it happens again, contact the administrator.
MODIFY_PASSWORD_TS.PASSWORD_NOT_UPDATED: The password could not be updated. Try to refresh the page. If it happens again, contact the administrator.
MODIFY_PASSWORD_TS.TOKEN_EXPIRED:
The token is not correct or has expired (it has a validity of {{tokenTime}} s).
If you want to generate a new one, click on the link to receive an email.
MODIFY_PASSWORD_TS.NEW_TOKEN: New token created. Check your mail.
